Posts.Content: Hi everyone I was wondering if like me your periods stopped suddenly befoe a lump was discovered and started up again following removal. My tumour was oestregen positive and having asked a few people who have also had had lumps oestregen positive their periods stopped and started up again after their surgery. I am wondering if there is any connection and would love to hear from you if this happened to you.Thanks for reading this.
Posts.Title: Before a breast lumps was discovered did your periods cease
